description.@en: I am uncertain when it began, but now I have come to understand my body craves the release of food. Nothing else soothes my nerves when darkness draws near, but the cravings can become intense, so much so that they drive me to distraction.

effect.@en: Whenever you share your food with another person, you gain an Assist Die to Fellowship-based Skill Tests to interact with them. However, whenever you don’t have at least seven days of food on-hand, you must flip the result to fail all Perception-based Skill Tests.
